meta_title: What Are Industrial Assets? Definition & Strategic Value
meta_description: Define assets in an industrial context as value-generating entities. Understand the difference between physical assets, CAPEX, and lifecycle management.
title: Defining Assets: The Strategic Industrial Perspective

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Defining Assets: The Strategic Industrial Perspective

image_prompt: A high-angle, photorealistic shot of a modern, clean industrial facility. A diverse team of maintenance engineers in high-visibility vests and protective helmets are gathered around a large, complex robotic assembly arm. One engineer is holding a ruggedized tablet showing a digital twin of the machinery. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting the scale and technological sophistication of the industrial assets. No text.
